text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
In anticipation of the Japanese Derby,<n>Symboli
Rudolf throws herself body and<n>soul into training,
but Air Groove worries<n>she's pushing herself too
hard.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She tries to shut Rudolf out of the<n>student council
office to relieve some of<n>the weight from her
shoulders, but<n>Rudolf seems dissatisfied.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
While Symboli Rudolf understands Air<n>Groove's
feelings, as both the president<n>and the Emperor,
she cannot stop.
